applicant-information.form-instructions-sin: Please provide your legal name as indicated on your Social Insurance Number (SIN) card or letter.
applicant-information.form-instructions-info: We'll use the information you provide to verify your identity. Any information that does not match the information on your SIN record may cause a delay in the processing of your application.
applicant-information.single-legal-name: If you have a single legal name
applicant-information.name-instructions: If using a single legal name, please enter that name in BOTH the first name and last name fields.

error-message.marital-status-no-partner-information: If you are married or in a common-law relationship you must enter their information on the next page. Select your marital status and press 'Save'.
error-message.sin-unique: The Social Insurance Number (SIN) must be unique
error-message.characters-valid: Only letters, numbers and the following characters are accepted: apostrophe ('), comma (,), period (.), hyphen (-) and bracket ()

communication-preference.note: If you're eligible, we will share your information with Sun Life Assurance Company of Canada (Sun Life). Sun Life will be responsible for handling member enrolment and administering claims processing and benefits for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
communication-preference.preferred-method: What is your preferred method of communication for Sun Life?
communication-preference.preferred-language: What is your preferred official language of communication?

error-message.email-match: The email addresses entered do not match
error-message.email-valid: Enter an email address in the correct format, such as name@example.com
error-message.confirm-email-valid: Enter confirmation of email address in the correct format, such as name@example.com

confirm.make-note: Save this code, you'll need it to check the status of your application.
confirm.keep-copy: Keep a copy of your application
confirm.print-copy-text: You will not receive a confirmation email. It is important to keep a copy of your application. You can use this button to print.
confirm.begin-process: We have received your application. Nothing further is required from you at this time.
confirm.cdcp-checker: You can use the <cdcpLink>Canadian Dental Care Plan Status Checker</cdcpLink> or call <noWrap>1-833-537-4342</noWrap> to track the progress of your application or to receive more information.
confirm.use-code: You can use your application code to track the progress within 48 hours of applying.
confirm.mail-letter: Once your application is processed, we will mail you a letter to inform you whether your application has been accepted or rejected.
confirm.register-msca-title: Register for a My Service Canada Account (MSCA) - Coming soon
confirm.register-msca-text: Prepare to get important updates about your Canadian Dental Care Plan application by registering for a <mscaLinkAccount>My Service Canada Account (MSCA)</mscaLinkAccount>.
confirm.register-msca-info: Soon, you will be able to view the following information in MSCA:
confirm.register-msca-correspondence: Official correspondence from the Government of Canada
confirm.register-msca-confirm: Letters confirming acceptance or rejection of your application
confirm.register-msca-checker: While we work on making these features available, we encourage you to use the <mscaLinkChecker>Canadian Dental Care Plan Status Checker</mscaLinkChecker> to stay updated on your application's progress.
confirm.how-insurance: How do I use my Canadian Dental Care Plan
confirm.eligible-text: If you are deemed eligible, Sun Life will send you a welcome package by mail. Your welcome package will include your member card and details about the Canadian Dental Care Plan, including your coverage start date. The Canadian Dental Care Plan will not cover you for dental services received before that date.
confirm.more-info-cdcp: For more information on what services and how much will be covered, visit <moreInfoLink>Canadian Dental Care Plan: What is covered</moreInfoLink>.
confirm.dental-benefit-has-access: Has access to the following benefits:
confirm.consent-answer: My spouse or common-law partner is aware and has consented to sharing of their personal information.
confirm.dental-private: Access to dental insurance or coverage

modal.info: By closing the application, you will end your session and any information entered will be cleared from your browser. Make sure you printed or save a copy of your application code.
modal.are-you-sure: Are you sure you want to close the application?

dental-benefits.title: Access to other federal, provincial or territorial dental benefits
dental-benefits.access-to-dental: Access to dental coverage through a provincial, territorial or federal government social program will not impact your eligibility for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
dental-benefits.eligibility-criteria: If you meet all the eligibility criteria, your coverage will be coordinated between the plans to ensure there are no gaps or duplication in coverage.

federal-benefits.title: Federal benefits
federal-benefits.legend: Do you have dental benefits through a social program offered by a federal program?
federal-benefits.option-no: No, I do not have federal dental benefits

social-programs.legend: Please select which social program you are covered under. If you have more than one, please select the one you use most.

provincial-territorial-benefits.title: Provincial or territorial benefits
provincial-territorial-benefits.legend: Do you have dental benefits through a social program offered by your province or territory?
provincial-territorial-benefits.option-yes: Yes, I have provincial or territorial dental benefits
provincial-territorial-benefits.option-no: No, I do not have provincial or territorial dental benefits

social-programs.input-legend: If yes, through which province or territory?
social-programs.radio-legend: Please select which social program you are covered under. If you have more than one, please select the one you use most.

error-message.federal-benefit-program-required: Select which federal program you are covered under
error-message.federal-benefit-required: Select whether you have federal dental benefits
error-message.provincial-benefit-program-required: Select which provincial or territorial program you are covered under
error-message.provincial-benefit-required: Select whether you have provincial or territorial dental benefits

dental-insurance.title: Access to other dental insurance
dental-insurance.legend: Do you have access to dental insurance or coverage:

list.employment: Through your employment benefits or a family member's employment benefits, including health and wellness accounts
list.pension: Through your pension benefits or a family member's pension benefits
list.purchased: Purchased by you or a family member or through a group plan from an insurance or benefits company
list.professional: Through a professional or student organization

dental-insurance.option-yes: Yes, I have access to dental insurance or coverage
dental-insurance.option-no: No, I do not have access to dental insurance or coverage

additional-info.title: Additional information
additional-info.eligible: Exception: You may still be eligible if you are retired and:

list.opted: you opted out of pension benefits before December 11, 2023, and
list.cannot-opt: you can't opt back in under the pension rules

additional-info.not-eligible: You are still considered to have access to dental insurance or coverage if you choose to opt out of benefits provided through your or a family member's:
additional-info.not-eligible-note: As such, you are not eligible for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
additional-info.not-eligible-purchased: If you purchased your current dental insurance policy privately on your own, you are not eligible for the Canadian Dental Care Plan while that coverage is in effect.

error-message.dental-insurance-required: Select whether you have access to dental insurance

tax-filing.form-instructions: Have you and your spouse or common-law partner (if applicable) filed your tax return for 2023 and received your Notice of Assessment?

error-message.tax-filing-required: Select whether or not you have filed your taxes

date-of-birth.description: Applications for the Canadian Dental Care Plan will open in phases. Your date of birth determines when you can apply.
date-of-birth.form-instructions: Please enter your date of birth

error-message.date-of-birth-day-required: Date of birth must include a day
error-message.date-of-birth-is-past: Date of birth must be in the past
error-message.date-of-birth-is-past-valid: Date of birth too far in the past
error-message.date-of-birth-month-required: Date of birth must include a month
error-message.date-of-birth-valid: Day must be valid for the given month and year
error-message.date-of-birth-year-number: Year must be a number, for example 1950
error-message.date-of-birth-year-required: Date of birth must include a year

file-your-taxes.ineligible-to-apply: You are not eligible to apply for the Canadian Dental Care Plan at this time.
file-your-taxes.tax-not-filed: You, your spouse or common-law partner have not filed a tax return for 2023 with the Canada Revenue Agency.
file-your-taxes.unable-to-assess: We use the information from your tax file to verify that the income and residency eligibility requirements are met for the plan.
file-your-taxes.tax-info: For more information on how to file your taxes, visit <taxInfo>Get ready to do your taxes</taxInfo>.
file-your-taxes.apply-after: You can apply for the plan after you or your spouse or common-law partner have filed your taxes and received your Notice of Assessment.

dob-eligibility.page-title: Find out when you can apply
dob-eligibility.ineligible-to-apply: You are not currently eligible to apply for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
dob-eligibility.currently-accepting: The Canadian Dental Care Plan is currently accepting applications for people aged 65 and above, children under 18, and adults with a valid disability tax credit.
dob-eligibility.later-date: Adults 18 to 64 who do not have a disability tax credit will be able to apply for the Canadian Dental Care Plan in 2025.
dob-eligibility.eligibility-info: <eligibilityInfo>Find out when you can apply for the Canadian Dental Care Plan</eligibilityInfo>

exit-application.are-you-sure: Are you sure you want to exit this application? If you click "Exit", the form will reset and the information will be lost.
exit-application.click-back: Click "Back" to return to the form.

partner-information.provide-sin: Provide information on your current spouse or common-law partner as indicated on their Social Insurance Number (SIN) card or letter.
partner-information.required-information: The information is required to calculate the adjusted family net income. Your spouse or common-law partner must submit their own application for the Canadian Dental Care Plan.
partner-information.single-legal-name: If your spouse or common-law partner has a single legal name
partner-information.name-instructions: If using a single legal name, please enter that name in BOTH the first name and last name fields.
partner-information.confirm-checkbox: I confirm that my spouse or common-law partner is aware and has agreed to share their personal information.

error-message.date-of-birth-day-required: Date of birth must include a day
error-message.date-of-birth-is-past: Date of birth must be in the past
error-message.date-of-birth-is-past-valid: Date of birth too far in the past
error-message.date-of-birth-month-required: Date of birth must include a month
error-message.date-of-birth-valid: Day must be valid for the given month and year
error-message.date-of-birth-year-number: Year must be a number, for example 1950
error-message.date-of-birth-year-required: Date of birth must include a year
error-message.sin-unique: The Social Insurance Number (SIN) must be unique
error-message.characters-valid: Only letters, numbers and the following characters are accepted: apostrophe ('), comma (,), period (.), hyphen (-) and bracket ()

contact-information.add-phone: Adding a phone number helps Government of Canada contact you if there is an issue with your application. Otherwise, we'll contact you by mail.
contact-information.add-email: Adding an email will help the Government of Canada and Sun Life contact you regarding your Canadian Dental Care Plan membership.

home-address.use-mailing-address: My home address is the same as my mailing address

mailing-address.address-required: Enter mailing address, typically number and street
mailing-address.city-required: Enter a city or town for your mailing address
mailing-address.country-required: Select a country for your mailing address your mailing address
mailing-address.postal-code-required: Enter postal code or zip code for your mailing address
mailing-address.postal-code-valid: Enter mailing address postal code in the correct format, such as A1A 1A1
mailing-address.province-required: Select a province, territory, state or region for your mailing address
mailing-address.zip-code-valid: Enter mailing address zip code in the correct format, such as 12345 or 12345-6789

home-address.address-required: Enter home address, typically number and street
home-address.city-required: Enter a city or town for your home address
home-address.country-required: Select a country for your home address
home-address.postal-code-required: Enter postal code or zip code for your home address
home-address.postal-code-valid: Enter home address postal code in the correct format, such as A1A 1A1
home-address.province-required: Select a province, territory, state or region for your home address
home-address.zip-code-valid: Enter home address zip code in the correct format, such as 12345 or 12345-6789

error-message.phone-number-valid: Phone number does not exist. If it's an international phone number, add '+' in front
error-message.phone-number-alt-valid: Phone number does not exist. If it's an international phone number, add '+' in front
error-message.email-match: The email addresses entered do not match
error-message.email-valid: Enter an email address in the correct format, such as name@example.com
error-message.confirm-email-valid: Enter confirmation of email address in the correct format, such as name@example.com
error-message.characters-valid: Only letters, numbers and the following characters are accepted: apostrophe ('), comma (,), period (.), hyphen (-) and bracket ()

review-information.read-carefully: Please review this information carefully. The information provided will be used by Sun Life to create your member account.

spouse-consent.label: Consent
spouse-consent.yes: My spouse or common-law partner is aware and has consented to sharing of their personal information.
spouse-consent.no: My spouse or common-law partner is aware and has not consented to sharing of their personal information.

review-information.dental-insurance-title: Access to other dental insurance or coverage
review-information.dental-benefit-change: Change answer to government dental benefits
review-information.dental-benefit-has-access: Has access to the following benefits:
review-information.dental-benefit-has-no-access: Has access to the following benefits:
review-information.submit-p-proceed: By proceeding with this application, you are agreeing to attest truthfully to the information provided.
review-information.submit-p-false-info: If you provide false information on your application, you and others you applied for may be removed from the plan.
review-information.submit-p-repayment: If you or your family members were not eligible to apply, you or your family member may have to repay the full cost of care received through the Canadian Dental Care Plan.

disability-tax-credit.non-refundable: The disability tax credit (DTC) is a non-refundable federal tax credit that helps people with disabilities, or their supporting family member, reduce the amount of income tax they may have to pay.
disability-tax-credit.more-info: <dtcLink>For more information on the disability tax credit (DTC)</dtcLink>
disability-tax-credit.form-label: Did you have a valid disability tax credit (DTC) with the Canada Revenue Agency for 2023?

error-message.disability-tax-credit-required: Select whether or not you have a valid disability tax credit

living-independently.description: Living independently from your parents means you are 16 or 17, do not receive financial support from your parents, and your primary residence is different from theirs.
living-independently.form-instructions: Do you live independently from your parents?

error-message.living-independently-required: Select whether or not you live independently from your parents

parent-or-guardian.page-title: Parent or guardian needs to apply
parent-or-guardian.unable-to-apply: You are not able to apply for the Canadian Dental Care Plan for yourself. Please have a parent or legal guardian apply on your behalf.
parent-or-guardian.apply-for-yourself: If you have already applied for your child and now want to apply for yourself, you must speak to a Service Canada representative. Contact Service Canada by calling  <noWrap>1-833-537-4342</noWrap>.
